string.value: You're looking for a clue about how to break the barrier from the #bSecretary of Magic#k.
You should visit #bScarrs#k, the mushroom scholar.
You told #bScarrs#k about the strange yet powerful barrier in the Mushroom Forest.

string.name: summary
string.value: You should visit #bScarrs#k, the mushroom scholar.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 4,200\r\nCan proceed to 'Killer Mushroom Spores (1)' quest\r\n

I think I've heard of a potion that breaks these types of barriers. I think it's called the #bKiller Spore Potion#k? Hmmm… you'll find the Mushroom Scholar #bScarrs#k waiting outside. #bScarrs#k is an expert on mushrooms, so go talk to him.
I am confident that #bScarrs#k will do everything to help you.
Why did you even bother asking when you knew you were going to say no? What a weirdo…
Ah! So you're the hero that people have been talking about. I'm #bScarrs, the Royal Mushroom Scholar#k representing the Mushking Empire. So you need some #bKiller Spore Potion#k?
#bKiller Spore Potion#k… I think I've heard of that before…
You should pay a visit to #bScarrs#k, the mushroom scholar.
